parameters.command: zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; whisper video.mp4 --model medium --output_format json --word_timestamps True --verbose False'

=zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf reel.mp4; ffmpeg -i merged.mp4 \
-vf "subtitles=transcript.ass" \
-c:a copy \
reel.mp4'

=zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf cut1.mp4; ffmpeg -i video.mp4 \
-vf "crop=1080:960:-300:400" \
-c:v libx264 -crf 18 -preset medium -c:a copy cut1.mp4'
=zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf cut2.mp4; ffmpeg -i video.mp4 -vf "crop=974:974:1650:357,scale=1080:960:flags=lanczos" -c:v libx264 -preset fast -crf 18 -c:a copy cut2.mp4'

zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf merged.mp4; ffmpeg -i cut1.mp4 -i cut2.mp4 \
-filter_complex "[0:v][1:v]vstack=inputs=2[v]" \
-map "[v]" -map "0:a?" \
merged.mp4'

=zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf cut1.mp4; ffmpeg -i video.mp4 \
-vf "crop=1080:960:-300:400" \
-c:v libx264 -crf 18 -preset medium -c:a copy cut1.mp4'

=zsh -lc 'source ~/.zshrc; rm -rf cut2.mp4; ffmpeg -i video.mp4 \
-vf "crop=1080:960:(iw-1080)/2+700:(ih-960)/2" \
-c:v libx264 -crf 18 -preset medium -c:a copy cut2.mp4'
